interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Review Date: 2020/10/30 Store: Anzuo Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.7 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FZ', 'UPC': '738626208554'} Review Text: I should have read the description on this set better, before ordering as they do not come with a base or top coat which is necessary to get the best longevity out of gel polish.

However I did order the base and top coat from this same brand on Amazon and it works really well. I love the colors in this set and it seems to last about 12-14 days as long as you prep your nails like you should for gel polish.

The color swatch stickers are also nice so you can paint them cure them and apply them to the tops of the bottles and you know which color is which without opening each bottle! Review Title: Good quality gel polish, but wish it included the base and top coat! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.7 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FZ', 'UPC': '738626208554'} I should have read the description on this set better, before ordering as they do not come with a base or top coat which is necessary to get the best longevity out of gel polish.

However I did order the base and top coat from this same brand on Amazon and it works really well. I love the colors in this set and it seems to last about 12-14 days as long as you prep your nails like you should for gel polish.

The color swatch stickers are also nice so you can paint them cure them and apply them to the tops of the bottles and you know which color is which without opening each bottle! Good quality gel polish, but wish it included the base and top coat!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** Strong inclination towards gel nail products, particularly in sets that offer multiple color options. 
- **Quality Focus:** Values high-quality, long-lasting nail products. Prefers non-toxic and cruelty-free options.
- **Purchase Behavior:** Engages in thoughtful purchasing, indicating a desire for thorough product understanding before buying. Is proactive in acquiring additional necessary items to enhance product performance.
- **Color Aesthetic:** Enjoys vibrant and varied color palettes, specifically favoring holiday-themed shades.
- **DIY Enthusiasm:** Demonstrates a keen interest in home nail care and DIY manicure kits, suggesting a hands-on approach to beauty.
- **Packaging Preference:** Appreciates practical features, such as color swatch stickers for organization and ease of use.
- **Review Engagement:** Willing to leave detailed feedback based on hands-on experience, indicating a desire to share knowledge and help others in their purchasing decisions. 

Overall, the user exhibits a balanced approach, preferring quality and practicality in nail care, while maintaining a vibrant and colorful aesthetic.
